doc.field: Sousa, Ahmed. Fayaḍānāt Baghdād fī al-tārīkh: baḥth fī tārīkh fayaḍānāt anhur al-ʻIrāq wa-taʼthīruhā bi-al-nisbah li-madīnat Baghdād = The floods of Baghdad in history (Baghdād : Al-Adib Press, 1963-1965)
